page.title: 08Mr.Heffer's life in Fordham.
page.content: {Mr. Heffer}has lived in{Fordham}all of his life which is{45 years.}He was born on the{1st of August 1939.}He went to the{old Fordham school}at the corner of{Market Street and Burwell {Road,}which is now developed into houses.{Mr. Heffer}has seen lots of changes and he say's that standards seemed to have changed.{Motor cars {were rarely seen}when he was young, and he can remember playing marbles in the streets with his brothers and friends.{The roads were not such good {quality}as they are today. The Sunday schools were much fuller than they are today, because people didn't have cars to go to the seaside on Sundays. { The Church was formed in 1816}and the {church building was built in 1818.}The Sunday school building was built by the Church in{1844}and was originally used as a{day school.}When Mr. Heffer
